properties.entry: SELECT RES_NO , HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_NAME , USER_NO , R.RO_NO , DATE_IN , DATE_OUT , RES_DATE , RES_STATUS , REQ , REASON_CANCEL , PAY_METHOD , PAY , PAY_DATE , RES_PEOPLE , RES_NAME , RES_PHONE , RES_EMAIL , H.IMG_PATH , RO_NAME , RO_PRICE , OP_NAME FROM TB_RES_INFO JOIN TB_HOTEL H USING (HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM R USING (HOTEL_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY DATE_IN ASC

SELECT RES_NO , HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_NAME , USER_NO , R.RO_NO , DATE_IN , DATE_OUT , RES_DATE , RES_STATUS , REQ , REASON_CANCEL , PAY_METHOD , PAY , PAY_DATE , RES_PEOPLE , RES_NAME , RES_PHONE , RES_EMAIL , H.IMG_PATH , RO_NAME , OP_NAME FROM TB_RES_INFO RI JOIN TB_HOTEL H USING (HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM R USING (HOTEL_NO) WHERE RES_NO = ?
SELECT WISH_NO , USER_NO , HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_NAME , REG_DATE , IMG_PATH FROM TB_WISH JOIN TB_HOTEL USING (HOTEL_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY WISH_NO ASC
